reference: Five dogs had their pancreas removed to make them diabetic (Operation=yes), the other five were normal (Operation=no). The rate of turnover of lactic acid was measured for each dog by two methods, infusion and injection.
usage: A data frame with 20 observations on the following 4 variables.
description:
Description
The rate of lactic acid turnover was measured by two methods for normal and diabetic dogs.
title: Lactic Acid Turnover in Dogs

parameters.Response: Rate for biochemical turnover of lactic acid
parameters.Method: Tracer method to measure response (infuse or inject)
parameters.Operation: Pancreas removed to make the dog diabetic? (no or yes)
parameters.Dog: Code for individual dogs (d1 through d10)
